articles.description:
🪂 POTENTIAL $STRK AIRDROP 🪂
The @argentHQ wallet team is known to be in close touch with Starknet.
If they are hinting at a token airdrop like this, we would recommend doing the quests.
8 weeks, 8 tasks and only a few hours left to qualify for Week 1.
Quick 3 steps 👇 https://twitter.com/argentHQ/status/1653429215084027905

Argent: Everyone knows $STARK is coming, and the best chance to get in on the action is to interact with dapps early
We're excited to launch the starknet xplorer campaign. 8 NFT drops over the next 8 weeks
Here's how to get the first one 👇 https://t.co/M9bnCRW5oM
